column4: network manager starts up after seeing your adapter, in your working example - thus it isn't able to adapt to seeing interfaces after they become available
for a device you don't have plugged in all the time mattycoze you'll probably have to either work around it or discover how to restart network manager at the desktop
actually on 8.10 you could just plug a device after boot, and NM would normally recognized it
right, but that is not a feature, it's a bug ;)
